title: Talktalk password not recognised by Tbird 102.8.0
content:
Have used Tbird with my TTalk account for years. On previous re-installs of Win10, TT password has always been tricky- I seem to remember something about a Certificate having to be changed. Anyway that was then. Now, after numerous attempts, including changing TT password, Tbird is stubbornly refusing to acknowlege the TT password, which works fine to give direct access on the TT email site.

My user name and all the incoming and outgoing server settings are fine and reecognised by Tbird on attempted import of my TT account. It is just the Password- Tbird tries in vain to recognise it on this final part of the import set up, and eventually it gives a message saying that the password appears incorrect. Which of course it isn't.

Any ideas gratefully received. Thanks.
creator: jamesramage

title: como sincronizar contactos de gmail
content:
¡Hola! Tenemos una cuenta gmail para compartir los contactos entre los compañeros. El problema es que thunderbird no sicroniza bien (ahora mismo, no los sincroniza para nada) los cambios que se hacen en esa cuenta. He intentado instalar tbsync, pero me aparece este mensaje: "La consulta de "gmail.com" no proporcionó la información necesaria con respecto a los extremos de los servicios de CalDAV y CardCAV. Escriba el nombre de host de su servidor para continuar con la configuración automática." ¿Cómo sé cuál es el nombre de host de mi servidor? Tampoco sé las direcciones de servidores de CalDAV y CardDAV para hacerlo manualmente. ¿Me podéis ayudar con el nombre de host del servidor? o ¿hay alguna otra opción para poder sincronizar los contactos? Lo que necesito es que los contactos estén en la nube, y no en mi ordenador para compartir la libreta de direcciones. Tal vez haya otra opción que no sea contacts.google que sea mejor.

¡Muchas gracias!
creator: oeizagirre

title: mail.com Impossibile autenticarsi sul server...
content:
Salve.

Non riesco a configurare un account mail.com su Thunderbird. Mi compare il seguente messaggio:

"Impossibile autenticarsi sul server. la configurazione, il nome utente o la password potrebbero essere errarti"

La password è quella giusta e anche i parametri ho messo quelli consigliati dal provider anche cambiando (non credo sia influente) i parametri di posta in uscita: vi allego due immagini a riguardo. Il nome utente è, come indicato nei parametri di configurazione mail.com, il mio indirizzo mail completo.
creator: cri6913

title: Protonmail messages disappear
content:
I have three email accounts, Protonmail. gmail and hotmail. All are linked to my Thunderbird mail client and normally work correctly. However, occasionally I "loose" about 3-weeks worth of the Protonmail messages, they just disappear from Thunderbird. The messages are still present on the Protonmail server and I can see them from my cell phone, but I cannot get Thunderbird to download them again. This has happened a few times over several months. The only way I can get the missing messages to Thunderbird on my computer is to forward them to myself from my cell phone. New messages download as normal. Gmail and hotmail are not affected.

The problem could be with Protonmail, but I don't think so. Thunderbird seems to "know" which messages have been downloaded and won't download them again. How can I force Thunderbird to download these missing messages? Thanks for any help.

Thunderbird 102.8.0 32 bit on Windows 10 Home version 21H2
creator: a.g.parker

title: Thunderbird - Errore TLS con Gmail
content: Usavo Thunderbird con account Gmail senza problemi, con tutte le impostazioni della Guida Gmail. Dopo una rinstallazione di Avast, l'account Gmail non funziona più dando : " Si è verificato un errore TLS che non può essere ignorato. Si tratta di un errore di handshake o probabilmente la versione TLS o il certificato usato dal server imail.gmap.com non sono compatibili." Ho provato a cambiare i vari parametri, senza risultato. Cosa posso fare? Grazie per il supporto. Enzo
creator: vinmaruc

title: Jak nastavit velikost zobrazení při psaní nové zprávy?
content: Když píšu novou zprávu, zobrazení textu v okně nové zprávy je velmi malé. Vím, mohu zvětšit zoom klávesami Ctrl + nebo Crtl kolečko myši. Tento postup u každé zprávy je však velmi otravný, potřeboval bych přenastavit defaultní zobrazení velikosti (zoomu) nové zprávy. Nechci měnit velikost fontu nového textu, to s tím nemá nic společného. Chci defaultně změnit pouze zoom, tedy přesně to, co dělá funkce Ctrl +. Např. u došlé zprávy vidím nějakou velikost textu, ale když dám odpovědět, tak ta velikost je o poznání menší. Nejde tedy o změnu fontu ale zoomu nové zprávy. Řešení bude pravděpodobně v editoru pokročilých voleb, jen nevím, kde.
creator: Ja.Claudius

title: Integrated graphic is not shown
content:
Dear helping guys,

I quite often get e-mails with integrated graphics. Sometimes the integrated graphics does note have a correct suffix (eg jpg). Then Thunderbird is not able to show the grapic, it shows an empty frame. If you open the graphic with an extern program (eg IrfanView) the programm notices, that the file is a graphic and is able to show the content.

Are there any consideration to eliminate this error? The browser client of T-Online, a German provider, that's to say, shows the content without problems.

Thank you very much for your kind attention, Goetz from Reichelsheim, Germany

title: thunderbird 102.8.0 says it can't update automatically and suggests I download fresh, but I am on latest version

periodically thunderbird is popping up saying it can't update, and please download the latest version manually. however I am already on the most recent version available.

I would guess that the site which thunderbird checks for updates is out of sync with the general download website, or the software gets confused when it is running continuously for more than a day.

title: unable to connect to server, authentication failed
content: I'm using Thunderbird already for a long time. Shortly after Google introduced the two step authentication I ran into problems with my gmail account in Thunderbird. (Not able to connect to server, authentication failed) I tried to fix by applying all tips that I could find, removed Avast securuty, reinstalled Thunderbird, checked for updates, checked Oauth 2.0 settings etc. Finally I have chosed another mail client for the gmail account that was causing problems and continued to use Thunderbird for the remaining accounts. Among these accounts is also my wife's gmail account. Now I'm faced with the same problem on that gmail account. Now I even tried to remove the profiles folder, de-installed Thunderbird, rebooted, downloaded and installed the latest version of Thunderbird. Then I tried to create an account for the gmail with no success. There are two different error messages (authentication failed or wrong password). Are there still things I can do to solve this problem?
creator: eijgenraam.jan

title: cannot complete creation of new account using gmail
content:
Using TB 102.8.0 (64-bit) on Windows 11 laptop. Whenever I attempt to create a new email account using a gmail address, I cannot complete the creation process to enter credentials because a BLANK popup window opens.

I have searched this and other forums multiple times and cannot find any solution. I have already done the following:

  • verified the outgoing and incoming server name, port, authentication method, etc.
  • enabled cookies
  • added accounts.google.com as an exception
  • deleted obsolete files (e.g. pkcs11.txt, session.json, xulstore.json)
  • tried to add using Trouble-shooting mode
  • disabled Malwarebytes

I already have one gmail account and another non-gmail address that are working fine. Please help.
creator: fred.a.marker

title: Emails not appearing on some computers
content:
Our business has Thunderbird installed on 9 computers, and 2 emails are shared on all of them, so employees can all keep up to date. The issue is (started about a year ago, maybe longer?) that some individual emails dont show up on all computers. I already checked the account settings, all are POP and all have the "leave messages on server" selected. This never used to be an issue, and then it started on one computer, and it wasn't something that happened often. But now it is effecting more computers, and missing multiple emails every single day.

Any thoughts on how / why this is happening and how to fix it would be great.

title: Specific benefits of archive folders?
content: What are the specific benefits of TB archive folders? I just let my old emails accumulate in various non-archive folders. Periodically, I delete emails that are too old or no longer relevant. I could archive instead of delete, but for my case I don't see the advantage. I used to keep the folders local, but now I keep the folders on a remote imap server, and back up all the emails. That way I can access my email from several computers, and everything stays consistent. I read that TB archive folders enhance safety and security. However, I am looking for a more specific benefit. Exactly how do they enhance safety or security? I am not suggesting there are not benefits. I am just trying to learn. Thanks
creator: dgoldman1

title: RETR command fails and prevents email from downloading
content:
My wife and I each have a Windows 10 account on the same computer. We have Thunderbird on both our Windows accounts and we use the same email server and email address at Comcast.net. Until now, for many years we have had no problems. But today, her Thunderbird cannot retrieve messages - she gets RETR command failed. Mail server mail.comcast.net responded Message 1002 expunged.

However, Thunderbird on my Windows 10 account has no problems downloading emails from that same server using the same email address. The Thunderbird settings on both our accounts are the same. She had a huge number of emails in her inbox, so she moved them to another folder to see if that would help. It didn't.

If there were a server issue we both would have problems. I rebooted the computer to see if her Thunderbird software had been corrupted, but the problem remains.

It appears that the 1002 refers to 10:02 am, the time the email was sent to us. Earlier attempts gave other numbers indicating later email times, so it seems to step backwards in time, perhaps because the emails were accessed by our tablet email apps, but they are still on the server.
creator: jernsue

title: Thudeerbird sends but cannot receive emails.
content: Today Thunderbird stopped downloading my e-mails from Comcast.net with the announcement: "The RETR command did not succeed. Error retrieving a message. Mail server mail.comcast.net responded: Message 4613 expunged." Is this a Thunderbird or a Comcast issue and how is it corrected?
